Changes
=======

0.1.2 (unreleased)
++++++++++++++++++

 - Minor additions to example configuration about CAS URL and auth_tkt
   plugin.
   [davidjb]

0.1 (2009-07-28)
++++++++++++++++
Initial release.

 - Provides repoze.who plugins (i.e.: challenge, identifier, chalenge decider and
   auth plugins) for enabling CAS
 - Provides simple unit tests
